AddisTech Suplies Network Infrastructure Look to all Addistech Enterprise Networks products and ICT Solutions for a better connected enterprise network. Addistech Delivers Campus Wired Network Design Options. The LAN is the networking infrastructure that provides access to network communication services and resources for end users and devices spread over a single floor or building. Addistech create a campus network by interconnecting a group of LANs that are spread over a small geographic area. Campus network design concepts are inclusive small networks that use a single LAN switch, up to very large networks with thousands of connections. The campus wired LAN enables communications between devices in a building or group of buildings, as well as interconnection to the WAN and Internet edge at the network core.
